kv5.10:7.3: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññatti āyatanapaññatti dhātupaññatti saccapaññatti indriyapaññatti puggalapaññattīti?
kv5.10:8.3: Sāvako jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv5.10:9.3: Sāvako anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū maggavidū maggakovidoti?
kv5.10:10.7: tena hi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṃ atthīti … pe ….
kv5.10:13.1: Vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimuttaṃ, sekhassa asekhaṃ ñāṇaṃ, viparīte ñāṇaṃ, aniyatassa niyāmagamanāya atthi ñāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāti, sammutiñāṇaṃ, cetopariyāye ñāṇaṃ, anāgate ñāṇaṃ, paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ, sāvakassa phale ñāṇanti.
kv5.10:16.1: Sattupaladdhiṃ, upaharato, balaṃ, gihi’ssa arahā ca, vimuttipañcamanti.
